titles.title: Let The Lord Have His Way

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Do you have a problem, and there's no way out?
And you need God's help; there's no doubt?
Then I say, rejoice, for God has been good to you.
For now, He may show you what He can do.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Let the Lord have His way.
Let the Lord have His way.
Well, all you've gotta do is pray,
Let the Lord have his way. (Repeat).

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Is there someone you love who is so close to you,
And you've tried to help, but you can't get through?
Well are you willing to trust that one into God's own hands?
You know the weakness of God is stronger than man.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Would you dare to ask for an impossibility?
Could you believe for that which could never be?
All things are possible to him who believes.
And Jesus said, Ask and you shall receive.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Above all we ask or think, God is able to do.
His promises are sure, and His word is true.
So if you'd like to see a miracle every day,
All you've got to do is pray,
Let the Lord have his way.
